name: koishi-plugin-multi-bot-controller-satori-ai-charon
description: Charon, the ancient Greek god of the River Styx, is configured to assign each Bot an independent satori-ai prompts and models, achieving persona isolation across multiple Bots.
author: MissPinkElf <xiaolan20020118@gmail.com>

description.zh: 古希腊掌管冥河渡河的神，用于为每个 Bot 配置独立的 satori-ai 提示词和模型，实现多 Bot 不同人设的隔离。
